project.name: J-C191A-CMUD-06-ST03-DT03-DF06-CF25-01
project.description: This test takes in a value from a taint source, and creates a string array based on the value. Math is performed on the value such that, if the value is 32749 or greater, the resultant value underflows and becomes positive. This results in an infinite loop.

iopair.name: J-C191A-CMUD-06-ST03-DT03-DF06-CF25-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: register a character, become an archon (essentially a superuser), destroy character Environment variable defining test value.

process.script: dd if=/dev/urandom count=1 bs=512 2> /dev/null | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' | fold -w 5 | head -1 >/tmp/screen_name.txt; cat /tmp/screen_name.txt

sleep 22 && screen -dmSL ${SS_SCREEN_NAME//[$'\t\r\n ']} "$SS_TC_DEPS/bin/tt++" "$SS_TC_ROOT/testData/good-01/good_01.tin"; while [[ `screen -ls` == *${SS_SCREEN_NAME//[$'\t\r\n ']}* ]]; do sleep 1; done;

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="1" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887
kill $(ps aux | grep 'coffee_mud' | grep -v 'grep' | awk '{print $2}'); echo "Killed coffee_mud"; date

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01-01 AND GOOD-01-02 AND GOOD-01-03 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

SS_TC_TEMPFILE="$(mktemp)" && grep -vE "^some_value\[20\] : 20$" "logfile.txt" > "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" && rm "logfile.txt" && mv "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" "logfile.txt" && printf "Cleaned pattern from logfile.\n"

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_zT1ZOQUJdMQykezm8xr9 AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_vcg34ZbBJg OR (NOT finished_S4oCHg9efo AND NOT (controlled_exit_rZeA8e92nd OR continued_execution_R3Ewy1n8wr)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_vcg34ZbBJg OR (NOT finished_S4oCHg9efo AND NOT (controlled_exit_rZeA8e92nd OR continued_execution_R3Ewy1n8wr))) OR controlled_exit_rZeA8e92nd)))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_vcg34ZbBJg OR (NOT finished_S4oCHg9efo AND NOT (controlled_exit_rZeA8e92nd OR continued_execution_R3Ewy1n8wr)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_vcg34ZbBJg OR (NOT finished_S4oCHg9efo AND NOT (controlled_exit_rZeA8e92nd OR continued_execution_R3Ewy1n8wr))) OR controlled_exit_rZeA8e92nd))

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep "finished evaluating" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;
